timeExcuse: I don't really have internet at work.
I don't have any others memorized.
... well, I dunno, can't you check on your own phone?
my work internet is pretty heavily filtered.
because I haven't been paid yet and I dunno, do I look like I would know?
timeSass: You could use your own phone, you know.
You're already on the internet, just Google it.
... why did you ask me over the internet instead of using your own phone?
Oh no, my phone is down to 3% battery now.

discord.role: [ giveaways | raid | pokemongo ] - set your role to subscribe to notifications
discord.fc: [ *(optional) @user* ] - Can be used as `!fc` to return your own saved friend code, or you can ping a user to see their saved friend code.
discord.friendcode: [ *(optional) @user* ] - Can be used as `!fc` to return your own saved friend code, or you can ping a user to see their saved friend code.
discord.set: [ fc ] [ friend code text ] - Saves a friend code to be used in `!fc`
discord.raid: - Pings the @raid notification group for Max Raid Battles
discord.time:
[ location name | @user ] - Finds local time of any of the following: Amsterdam, Chicago, Miami, Portland, Sydney, Tokyo
ex: `!time Tokyo`
discord.symbols: [ *(optional) symbol desired* ] - Prints ★ ✚ \♥ ✿ ♫ ♪ or the desired symbol
discord.sym: [ *symbol desired* ] - Prints ★ ✚ \♥ ✿ ♫ ♪ or the desired symbol
discord.ga: Pings the people subscribed to @giveaways to announce a Discord-only giveaway

reference.ballsprites: shows a picture of all the Pokeball mini-sprites
reference.dex: [ pokemon name | pokdex number ] - Get the Serebii link to that Pokemon's page
reference.num: [ pokemon name | pokdex number ] - `dex` command, but with link previews disabled: URL only
reference.ability: [ pokemon name | pokdex number ] - Get the abilities of the Pokemon species
reference.ha: [ pokemon name | pokdex number ] - Get the abilities of the Pokemon species
reference.type:
[ pokemon name | number | typings ] - Get the type weaknesses for a Pokemon
ex: `!type water flying` or `!type gyarados`
reference.sprite: [ pokemon name | number ] - Shows the Pokemon sprite
reference.shiny: [ pokemon name | number ] - Shows the shiny Pokemon sprite
reference.nature: [ nature ] - Returns the stat effects of the nature
reference.pokejobs: [ task title ] - Responds with the desired Pokemon type, and full description of the PokeJob
reference.vivillon: shows a picture of all Vivillon patterns
reference.viv: shows a picture of all Vivillon patterns

commandDexDetail.type:
`!type [ pokemon name | pokedex number | typings ]`
`!type Gyarados` - returns Gyarados's type weaknesses.
`!type water electric` returns type-matchups for a Pokemon with Water-Electric duo typings.
commandDexDetail.set:
!set [ fc | time ] [ text ]
`!set fc 0000-0000-0000 | Ash (Sw)` - Sets friend code to desired text.
`!set time America/Los_Angeles` - WIP: Location must be saved in the precise format.
commandDexDetail.symbols:
`!symbols` - displays ★ ✚ \♥ ✿ ♫ ♪, can be used to retrieve individual symbols.
`!symbols star` will return only the star symbol.
